Podcasts

Podcasts Exist, and if You Somehow Haven't Heard, Now You Have!

Podcasts are getting quite good recently, so I‚Äôve decided to recommend some podcasts and software I use for accessing them.

  • The Minimalists
    • Suit and tie corporate guys talk about a meaningful life with less.
  • Safety Third
    • Internet science celebrities talk about what they do.
  • The Tim Ferris Show
    • Tim Ferris explores new and bizarre topics every episode.
  • The WAN Show
    • Tech news + Linus Media Group behind the scenes.

All of these podcasts I have on auto-download using: Antenna Pod on Android. You don‚Äôt have to try them all, but I highly recommend checking out at least one that you find interesting.
